general: Start your weekend productively, dear Scorpio, and bring order to your life. The Moon in Aries brings you a surge of motivation and energy, helping you regain control. If you have pending projects, this is the perfect time to move forward. Simple actions can also bring you rewards, so donâ€™t forget to focus on your tasks and to-do list. Tonight, as Chiron feels his influence, take the time to evaluate your health and identify where you need additional support. This is the moment to take the first steps towards changes that will enhance your well-being.
love: Take the time to listen to your partner's needs.
work: Implement your ideas, now is the time to act.
health: Listen to your body and incorporate moments of rest.
advice: Move forward with determination and clarity.
teaser: A day to move forward and take control.
